snippet: The Senate Republican leader called the White House staff and allied Democrats in Congress "liberal thugs."
abstract: The Senate Republican leader called the White House staff and allied Democrats in Congress "liberal thugs."
lead_paragraph: Mitch McConnell, the Senate Republican leader, has never been a particular favorite among the fire-breathers at the annual Conservative Political Action Conference. Unlike the movement's true believers, he's a creature of Senate opportunism rather than rigid ideology.
